name: 2025 10th International Conference on Energy Materials and Applications
content: Publication: Option 1: Accepted and registered papers will be published in journals of Scientific.Net collection. (https://www.scientific.net/) Papers will be sent for indexing by Scopus, Inspec, Chemical Abstracts Service, Google Scholar etc. ☆ Retrieval information is extracted from the journal official website. ICEMA provides opportunities for academic exchanges, the conference could not guaranttee on future retrieval status. Please be aware of this before submission. Your paper will be published in either one of the below journals according to your paper topic. ① DDF(Defect and Diffusion Forum) https://www.scientific.net/DDF/Details ② SSP(Solid State Phenomena) https://www.scientific.net/SSP/Details ③ MSF (Materials Science Forum) https://www.scientific.net/MSF/Details ④ KEM (Key Engineering Materials) https://www.scientific.net/KEM/Details Option 2: The accepted (Registered & Presented) full papers will be published in the International Journal of Smart Grid and Clean Energy (IJSGCE). ISSN: 2373-3594 (Online) Abstracting/ Indexing: CNKI, Google Scholar, Inspec (IET), Crossref, etc.
